mapper.insert: INSERT into tb_board (title, content, user_id, date_time) VALUES (#{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT b.id, b.title, u.name as writer from tb_board AS b LEFT JOIN tb_user AS u ON b.user_id = u.id
select b.id, b.title, b.content, b.view_count, b.date_time from tb_board as b left join tb_comment as c on b.id = c.board_id where c.id = #{commentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
